prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered crouched binding pose with chains of geometric patterns, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted geometric edges head with unique octahedral structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying fractal. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating octahedral, fractal spirals patterns, styled with guides influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by silver and neutral grey inspired by mercurial ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and octahedral emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns with fractal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor VIXPALG's profile: 'He who consumes', Aethyr ASP, Air element, Tarot The Devil, Sephirot Binah, Zodiac Capricorn, embodying the essence: 'In VIXPALG's presence, the atmosphere grows intensely heavy and demanding an insatiable force that hungers for more, pulling all energy into its voracious embrace.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered crouched binding pose with chains of geometric patterns
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted geometric edges head with unique octahedral structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multi-faceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying fractal
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating octahedral, fractal spirals patterns, styled with guides influences

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who consumes'
profile_data.essence: In VIXPALG's presence, the atmosphere grows intensely heavy and demanding an insatiable force that hungers for more, pulling all energy into its voracious embrace.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Voracious Abyss; guides stoneclad guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted obsidian construct with razor-sharp geometric edges, representing the consuming nature of Air and the penetrating wisdom of Capricorn's stone-like determination
profile_data.color_reasoning: Black represents the void of Binah, silver signifies Air's mercurial intelligence, shifting pattern reflects the consuming transformative power of the Devil archetype
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Octahedron symbolizes Air element, fractal spirals represent infinite consumption and recursive cosmic patterns
